query:
UPDATE prover_jobs
                SET
                    status = 'queued',
                    updated_at = NOW(),
                    processing_started_at = NOW()
                WHERE
                    (
                        status = 'in_progress'
                        AND processing_started_at <= NOW() - $1::INTERVAL
                        AND attempts < $2
                    )
                    OR (
                        status = 'in_gpu_proof'
                        AND processing_started_at <= NOW() - $1::INTERVAL
                        AND attempts < $2
                    )
                    OR (
                        status = 'failed'
                        AND attempts < $2
                    )
                RETURNING
                    id,
                    status,
                    attempts
